#  The Cajuput Spa 

Welcome to the official repository of
![halo](https://img.shields.io/badge/The_Cajuput_Spa-FFFFFF.svg?&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,) 

## About The Cajuput Spa

The Cajuput Spa is our group project as part of our academic coursework. We present an innovative solution for the spa industry, focusing on sustainability and a unique customer experience. This project involves the development of a digital spa application that makes it easy for users to explore services, book treatments, and plan their spa visits.

## Table of Contents

- [About](#about-the-cajuput-spa)
- [Technologies Used](#technologies-used)
- [First Setup](#first-setup)
- [Running The Program](#running-the-program)
- [Contributors](#contributors)

## Technologies Used

- ![Laravel](https://img.shields.io/badge/Laravel_11-%23FF2D20?logo=Laravel&logoColor=white) 
Laravel is a PHP web application framework used for developing robust and maintainable web applications.

- ![LiveWire](https://img.shields.io/badge/Livewire-%23ED64A6?logo=livewire) 
Livewire is a full-stack framework for Laravel that allows you to build dynamic UI components without leaving PHP.

- ![Alpine.js](https://img.shields.io/badge/Alpine.js-%238BC0D0.svg?logo=Alpine.js&logoColor=white) 
Alpine is a rugged, minimal tool for composing behavior directly in your markup.

- ![Tailwindcss](https://img.shields.io/badge/TailwindCSS-%2306B6D4?logo=Tailwindcss&logoColor=white)
Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework for building custom designs without having to leave your HTML.

- ![Flowbite](https://img.shields.io/badge/Flowbite-5468ff.svg?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)
Flowbite is a Tailwind CSS component library that provides additional UI components and utilities.

- ![Splide](https://img.shields.io/badge/SplideJs-%230c1012.svg?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,) 
Splide.js is a lightweight, flexible, and customizable slider/carousel library for JavaScript, designed for modern web applications.

- ![Intervention](https://img.shields.io/badge/Intervention_Image-%23dee4ed.svg?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,) 
Intervention Image is a open source PHP image processing library, supports PHP's two most common image processing libraries GD Library and Imagick.

- ![Xendit](https://img.shields.io/badge/Xendit-4573FF?&logo=xendit&logoColor=white) 
Xendit is a payment gateway that makes payments easier for various types of businesses in Indonesia and the Philippines.

## First Setup

1. **Clone the repository:**
   ```
   git clone https://github.com/AriPandita/simparisApp.git
   ```

2. **Install dependencies:**
   ```
   composer install
   npm install
   composer require maatwebsite/excel --with-all-dependencies
   ```

3. **Set up environment variables:**
   ```
   cp .env.example .env
   php artisan key:generate
   ```

   Update the `.env` file with your database configuration and any other necessary settings.

4. **Run migrations:**
   ```
   php artisan migrate
   ```

5. **Run database seeder:**
   ```
   php artisan db:seed
   ```

6. **Run linked storage:**
   ```
   php artisan storage:link
   ```

7. **Compile assets:**
   ```
   npm run dev
   ```

8. **Serve the application:**
   ```
   php artisan serve
   ```

## Running the program

Once the setup is complete, visit `http://localhost:8000` in your web browser to view the website.

```
login
username : admin@cajuput.com
password : 12345678
```
